name: Skelascent
description:
Help this skeleton escape from the Meat Lord and his sinewy subordinates in the endless Flesh Pit!

This game was made in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam #9.  The theme was climbing.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrowkeys to move
  • Mouse to aim and throw bones
  • Escape or P to pause the game

Ascend the pit while avoiding the enemies and traps. If you're too slow, the Meat Lord will catch you. Collect bones and throw them at enemies to kill them. Try to get the highest score possible by ascending the pit, collecting bones, and defeating enemies.

Credits
  • Player death sound provided by LittleRobotSoundFactory, licensed under CC BY 3.0
  • Terrain tiles by Adam Saltsman
  • Programming and design by p-han-tom and BootleBen
  • Player, item, and enemy art by p-han-tom and BootleBen
  • Music by BootleBen
